nodes.text: Callis Beck was an investigator and skip tracer working on Ord Mynock. Beck was hired by ComNet Corporation. For a fee of 20,000 credits, Beck was hired to locate a being known as "Stoneheart."
Beck had one lead; a droid reportedly owned by Stoneheart was in Ord Mynock Freeport, and that the passage to spaceport was paid for by the antiquities dealer Leezoth.
